@Test public void testMoreLargeValues(){
  int populationSize=26896;
  int sampleSize=895;
  int numberOfSucceses=55;
  double[][] data={{0.0,0.155168304750504,0.155168304750504,1.0},{1.0,0.29437545000746,0.449543754757964,0.844831695249496},{2.0,0.273841321577003,0.723385076334967,0.550456245242036},{3.0,0.166488572570786,0.889873648905753,0.276614923665033},{4.0,0.0743969744713231,0.964270623377076,0.110126351094247},{5.0,0.0260542785784855,0.990324901955562,0.0357293766229237},{20.0,3.57101101678792e-16,1.0,3.78252101622096e-16},{21.0,2.00551638598312e-17,1.0,2.11509999433041e-17},{22.0,1.04317070180562e-18,1.0,1.09583608347287e-18},{23.0,5.03153504903308e-20,1.0,5.266538166725e-20},{24.0,2.2525984149695e-21,1.0,2.35003117691919e-21},{25.0,9.3677424515947e-23,1.0,9.74327619496943e-23},{50.0,9.83633962945521e-69,1.0,9.8677629437617e-69},{51.0,3.13448949497553e-71,1.0,3.14233143064882e-71},{52.0,7.82755221928122e-74,1.0,7.84193567329055e-74},{53.0,1.43662126065532e-76,1.0,1.43834540093295e-76},{54.0,1.72312692517348e-79,1.0,1.7241402776278e-79},{55.0,1.01335245432581e-82,1.0,1.01335245432581e-82}};
  testHypergeometricDistributionProbabilities(populationSize,sampleSize,numberOfSucceses,data);
}
